summary: This tutorial covers JavaScript and HTML DOM concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use JavaScript and HTML DOM effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of JavaScript and HTML DOM and how to apply it in your projects.
